div.p: Roles of Participants that may be included in a CarePlan.Participants, or in an EpisodeOfCare.CareTeam. Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 125676002 (Person)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 223366009 (Healthcare professional)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 394730007 (Healthcare related organisation)

description.value: Roles of Participants that may be included in a CarePlan.Participants, or in an EpisodeOfCare.CareTeam. Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).
